issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Add input_file_name function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12290](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12290). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For lineage and diffing purposes (used by protocols like DeltaLake) it can be useful to know the source of input data for a Dataframe. This adds the `input_file_name` function which, like Spark, returns the name of the file being read, or NULL if not available.
